alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Lewis; Ritchie; Wirt (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 3:18PM EDT until July 28 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Calhoun County in north central West Virginia... Ritchie County in northwestern West Virginia... Southwestern Doddridge County in northern West Virginia... Northern Gilmer County in north central West Virginia... West central Lewis County in northern West Virginia... Southeastern Wirt County in northwestern West Virginia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 317 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Bend State Park, or near Harrisville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisville, Glenville, Pennsboro, North Bend State Park, Ellenboro, Cairo, Pullman, Auburn, Smithville, Newberne, Pike, Big Springs, Berea, Brohard, Tanner, Macfarlan, Burnt House, Greenwood, Blandville, and Baldwin. This includes Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 32 and 48. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Lewis; Ritchie; Wirt
